title: Incinerator Maintenance Supervisor
description:
Job Qualifications

  • Bachelorâ€™s degree in Mechanical Engineering
  • 6 years in incinerator operations with a minimum capacity of over 100 tons/day; or 6 years in the boiler industry or power plants.
  • Strong understanding of Piping and Instrument Diagrams (P&IDs), industrial process control, pneumatic and hydraulic systems, heat exchangers, compressors, pumps, and electrical control panels.
  • Familiarity with PLC, DCS, and CAD is highly recommended.
  • Experience operating incinerators or boilers using DCS.
  • Direct maintenance experience.

  • Established connections with spare part suppliers.
  • Ability to work at heights (up to 25 meters), work overtime, including night shifts and holidays.
